sqlMap.select: SELECT , t.tag_name, h.ctr FROM temp_bibtex b LEFT OUTER JOIN tas t ON b.content_id = t.content_id, bibhash h WHERE ORDER BY b.rank

SELECT , t.tag_name, h.ctr FROM bibtex b, tas t, bibhash h, (SELECT t1.content_id FROM WHERE AND t1.content_type = #contentType# AND t1.group = #groupType# ORDER BY t1.date DESC LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#) AS tt WHERE b.content_id = tt.content_id AND t.content_id = tt.content_id AND ORDER BY b.date DESC, b.content_id DESC

SELECT , t.tag_name, g.group_name, h.ctr FROM bibtex b, tas t, groupids g, bibhash h, (SELECT t1.content_id FROM WHERE
AND t1.content_type = #contentType# AND t1.user_name = #userName# ORDER BY t1.date DESC LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#) AS tt WHERE tt.content_id=b.content_id AND tt.content_id=t.content_id AND AND g.group = b.group ORDER BY b.date DESC, b.content_id DESC

SELECT , t.tag_name, g.group_name, h.ctr FROM bibtex b, tas t, groupids g, bibhash h, (SELECT DISTINCT b.content_id FROM bibtex b, WHERE
AND t1.content_type = #contentType# AND t1.user_name = #userName# AND t1.content_id = b.content_id GROUP BY b.content_id ORDER BY t1.date DESC LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#) AS tt WHERE tt.content_id = b.content_id AND AND tt.content_id = t.content_id AND g.group = b.group
ORDER BY b.date DESC, b.content_id DESC

SELECT , t.tag_name, g.group_name, h.ctr FROM bibtex b, bibhash h, (SELECT content_id, date FROM bibtex b, friends f WHERE f.f_user_name = #userName# AND b.user_name = f.user_name AND b.group = #groupType# ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset# ) AS bb LEFT OUTER JOIN tas AS t ON bb.content_id = t.content_id, groupids AS g WHERE t.group = g.group AND AND b.content_id = bb.content_id ORDER BY bb.date DESC, bb.content_id DESC

SELECT , t.tag_name, b.ctr FROM (SELECT , h.ctr FROM bibtex b FORCE INDEX (group_date_content_id_idx), bibhash h WHERE `group` = #groupType# AND ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 15) AS b LEFT OUTER JOIN tas t ON b.content_id=t.content_id ORDER BY b.date DESC, b.content_id DESC

SELECT , t.tag_name, h.ctr FROM (SELECT content_id, date FROM collector WHERE user_name = #userName#) AS c LEFT OUTER JOIN tas AS t ON c.content_id = t.content_id, bibtex b, bibhash h WHERE b.content_id = c.content_id AND ORDER BY c.date DESC, content_id DESC

SELECT , t.tag_name, h.ctr FROM (SELECT , b2.simhash$simHash$ FROM bibtex b2 WHERE simhash$requestedSimHash$ = #hash# AND b2.group = #groupType# ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#) AS b LEFT OUTER JOIN tas t ON b.content_id = t.content_id, bibhash h WHERE ORDER BY b.date DESC, b.content_id DESC
SELECT ctr FROM bibhash WHERE hash = #hash# AND type = #simHash#

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM bibtex b WHERE simhash$requestedSimHash$ = #hash#
AND user_name = #userName# ORDER BY date DESC) AS b2 LEFT OUTER JOIN tas t ON b2.content_id = t.content_id LEFT OUTER JOIN document d ON (d.content_id = b2.content_id AND d.user_name = b2.user_name), bibhash h, groupids g WHERE AND b2.group = g.group ORDER BY b2.date DESC, b2.content_id DESC

SELECT , t.tag_name, b.ctr FROM (SELECT , h.ctr FROM bibtex b2, bibhash h, search s WHERE s.group = #groupType# AND MATCH (s.content) AGAINST (#search# IN BOOLEAN MODE) AND s.content_type = #contentType# AND AND b2.content_id = s.content_id
s.user_name = #userName#
ORDER BY s.date DESC LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#) AS b LEFT OUTER JOIN tas AS t ON t.content_id = b.content_id ORDER BY b.date DESC, b.content_id

SELECT count(*) FROM search s WHERE s.group = #groupType# AND MATCH (s.content) AGAINST (#search# IN BOOLEAN MODE) AND s.content_type = #contentType#
s.user_name = #userName#

SELECT , t.tag_name, b.ctr FROM (SELECT , b2.group, h.ctr FROM bibtex b2, bibhash h WHERE b2.group = #groupType# AND ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#) AS b LEFT OUTER JOIN tas AS t ON t.content_id = b.content_id ORDER BY b.date DESC, b.content_id DESC

SELECT , t.tag_name, g.group_name, h.ctr FROM bibtex b, bibhash h, (SELECT b2.content_id, b2.date FROM () AS b1 JOIN bibtex b2 ON b1.simhash1 = b2.simhash1 AND b2.user_name = #userName#) AS bb LEFT OUTER JOIN tas AS t ON bb.content_id = t.content_id, groupids AS g WHERE t.group = g.group
AND AND b.content_id = bb.content_id ORDER BY b.simhash1 DESC, bb.date DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM () AS duplicates

SELECT , t.tag_name, g.group_name, h.ctr FROM bibtex b, bibhash h, ((SELECT content_id, date FROM bibtex b, groups g WHERE g.group = #groupId# AND g.user_name = b.user_name
)UNION( SELECT content_id, date FROM bibtex b, groups g, friends f WHERE f.f_user_name = #userName# AND g.user_name = f.user_name AND b.user_name = f.user_name AND g.group = #groupId# AND b.group = $groupType$ )UNION( SELECT content_id, date FROM bibtex b, groups g WHERE b.user_name = #userName# AND g.user_name = b.user_name AND g.group = #groupId# ) ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#) AS bb LEFT OUTER JOIN tas AS t ON bb.content_id = t.content_id, groupids AS g WHERE t.group = g.group AND AND b.content_id = bb.content_id ORDER BY bb.date DESC, bb.content_id DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM bibtex b, groups g WHERE g.group = #groupId# AND b.user_name = g.user_name

SELECT , t.tag_name, g.group_name, h.ctr FROM bibtex b, bibhash h, LEFT OUTER JOIN tas AS t ON bb.content_id = t.content_id, groupids AS g WHERE t.group = g.group AND AND b.content_id = bb.content_id ORDER BY bb.date DESC, bb.content_id DESC

SELECT , t.tag_name, g.group_name, b2.ctr FROM (SELECT , b.group, h.ctr FROM bibtex b, bibhash h WHERE AND b.user_name = #requestedUserName#
ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#) AS b2 LEFT OUTER JOIN tas AS t ON b2.content_id = t.content_id, groupids AS g WHERE b2.group = g.group ORDER BY b2.date DESC, b2.content_id DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM bibtex b WHERE b.user_name = #requestedUserName#
